_comment: Copy to ~/.claude/settings.json and customize for your machine

permissions._comment_permissions: These are broad permissions. For tighter control, replace with granular rules like: Bash(git add:*), Bash(gh run watch:*), Read(/path/to/project/**)

hooks.prompt:
<autolearn>
NEVER block, reject, or stop user input. This is passive context only.
As you work: note mistakes you correct, gotchas you hit, and patterns you discover.
When the session has produced notable learnings, suggest the user run /reflect.
Triggers: you corrected an error, hit a platform gotcha, made an architectural decision, or the conversation is getting long.
Keep this nudge brief -- e.g. "Tip: run /reflect to capture the [X] pattern we discovered."
</autolearn>

_comment_plugins: Add language-specific LSP plugins as needed: gopls-lsp, typescript-lsp, rust-analyzer-lsp, csharp-lsp, pyright-lsp. Add service plugins as needed: sentry, Notion, playwright, greptile, ralph-loop, frontend-design
